Description:
AtkinsRealis are looking for a Landscape Architects to join our team in Madinah, Saudi Arabia.Responsibilities: Leads and manages the design of various projects including day to day coordination with project team members

 Develops and creates high quality and innovative concept designs

 Prepares preliminary and detailed design drawings and documentation including technical specifications and construction detailing

Selects and recommends landscape materials and palette for hardscape, softscape and site furniture based on local knowledge/experience of materials

Leads and manages developing concept and detailed master plan focused on public realm design and strategies

Ability to manage and execute a project from concept through to construction documentation

 Strong graphics and presentation skills in both hand sketches and digital program/software

 Attend client presentations and meetings including internal team meetings and workshops

 Ability to multi-tasks in a fast-paced working environment

 Assist in any business development, win work and delivering technical/commercial proposalsSkills and Qualifications:A degree in Landscape Architecture from an accredited university

10 years of working experience in Landscape Architecture, Urban Design, Master Planning

 Minimum of 5 years work experience in GCC is mandatory

 Strong verbal, written and graphic communication skills

Strong computer skills (AutoCAD, Adobe Photoshop, Indesign, Illustrator, Sketch Up, Lumion, Microsoft Office)

 Basic to intermediate knowledge/skills in Revit is an advantageSalary & Benefits We offer an excellent package which includesA competitive salary

22 working days annual leave

Medical and life insurance cover

Company gratuity scheme

Discretionary bonus scheme

Annual flight allowance to point of originJob Details
